txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> for Abedec from the north-western Watchtower
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> for Abedec from the south-eastern Watchtower
The Corsairs have landed on a beach south-west of Dol Amroth.\n\nJajax has asked you to search for Abedec at the beach-side landing spot, while he searches some ruins to the south.
You have found Hashadîr, and Corsairs are everywhere...
Lothíriel has heard reports of Corsair scouts who may have infiltrated the great city of Dol Amroth.
Meet Jajax at the cross-roads
You see no signs of Captain Abedec from this vantage point
You see no signs of Captain Abedec from this vantage point
This is a good vantage point
This is a good vantage point

Jajax's meeting place is where the roads meet between the two Corsair encampments -- one leads from the south-west, from Hashadîr, and the other leads from the ruins to the south.\n\nYou should meet Jajax at the cross-roads.
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> for Abedec from the south-eastern watch-tower
'[placeholder]! You must escape, quickly! He is coming. It is too late for me, but run, run!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> for Abedec from the north-western watch-tower
Jajax is nowhere to be found. Something must have gone wrong...
Jajax is likely somewhere in the ruins to the south of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should search for Jajax, for he is probably in need of rescue.
Search for Jajax in the ruins to the south
The Search for Abedec
Find the beach upon which the Corsairs have landed

'If we do not take out Abedec, he will not rest until we are both hunted down and beheaded, for that is his style. I always admired him for it, but not when it's my head on the line.

'Do you wish to work together once more? I say we split up and investigate the two camps where Corsairs have made their landings south of Dol Amroth. You go to the beach to the south-west, and I will investigate the ruins to the south.

'Search for Abedec, but do not engage him. We must fight him together. Let us meet on the cross-roads between the two camps when we're done.'

Good vantage points for searching for signs of Abedec can be found atop the watch-towers in Hashadîr, south-west of Dol Amroth.\n\nYou should climb the watch-towers on the beach and <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> for signs of Abedec.
